pages.text: $(w)The bloomery create one Iron Ingot - Purity (8%) for a raw Iron Ore Chunk. However if you toss in Iron Ore Pieces in the bloomery you will obtain 3 ingots instead of 1.$(br2)You have to open the hatch and throw the items in the bloomery along with the fuel. Valid fuels are coal (2), coal cokes (4) and charcoal (1). There is a maximum of 32 items being smelted at the same time.
$(mBlock)The chimney must be 2 to 4 blocks tall.

$(w)Start the bloomery by holding right-click on the hatch with the fire starter (flint and steel doesn't work). Once the bloomery is finished, mine the bloom with a pickaxe.$(br2)Wiki Chapter: $(br)$(l:wiki_manuals/charcoal_pit)Charcoal Pit Wiki$(/l)
